name: Azimov's Run
description:
In this game, Azimov, a robot created to destroy by an evil company, runs for his freedom and faces many challenges to achieve this dream.

Enemy robots will try to destroy you during your escape.

Defeat the Boss on Story Mode to finally be free.

Controls:

Press the Space key to Jump.

Hold the Space key to Jump higher.

Press Z to Fire. 

Firing too much will cause recoil to throw you onto the lases on the back of the room, destroying your robot.
